name: Dive
isFieldMove: The player can dive underwater on the Pokémon's back while surfing over deep waters. It can be taught to a Pokémon by using HM08 in Ruby, Sapphire, and Emerald. Since Generation IV it has been a regular level-up move. In Generation V, it has regained HM status as HM06; in Pokémon X and Y, it again lost its HM status; in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire, it again regained HM status as HM07.
